Docs.summary: Provides access to Near Field Communication (NFC) functionality, allowing applications to read NDEF message in NFC tags.

remarks.para: Provides access to Near Field Communication (NFC) functionality, allowing applications to read NDEF message in NFC tags. A "tag" may actually be another device that appears as a tag.
For more information, see the Near Field Communication guide.

Note: Not all Android-powered devices provide NFC functionality.
